name: impulse (markysoft)
description:
Pilot a drone remotely to power up a derelict spaceship.
Collect cores, charge the battery, escape via the transporter without colliding with the walls or obstacles too much.

Your remote view is based on blueprints and sensors, hence the simple blue/white/orange graphics!

  • 16 levels!
  • gravity!
  • A couple of surprises!
  • dangerous force fields!
  • extremely forceful vents!
  • crates of alien who-knows-what!
  • doors that don't stay open quite long enough!

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Original music by me.

Known issues

You might need to reload the page in Chrome to get the controls to work.

On some iPhones the music doesn't stop properly and each track plays over the top of the previous track causing a cacophony of noise.

On some phone browsers the long press causes a menu pop up.
